member.name: T:CsGL.Basecode.App
member.summary: Provides static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods and properties to manage a CsGL application. It provides methods and properties to start and stop a looped CsGL application and to manage its runtime state. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.para: The App class has methods to start and stop CsGL applications and to provide useful CsGL application functionality.

Call to start a CsGL application using the appropriate inherited . Call to forcibly end a running CsGL application. Calling toggles between your supplied Windows Form and the fullscreen form. Call to reset the application's current framerate calculations.
This class has numerous properties to get or set information about the current state of the application.
You cannot create an instance of this class.
